item.title: Aspose.Email for CPP 24.1 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes information for Aspose.Email for C++ 24.1. Aspose.Email for C++ 24.1 is based on Aspose.Email for .NET 23.12. Aspose.Email for C++ does not support asyncronic features of e-mail protocols New Features Setting Relative Path to Resources when Saving Email Message as HTML You can now choose to save email resources with relative paths when exporting email messages to HTML format. This feature provides more flexibility in how resources are linked in the output HTML file, making it easier to share and display saved emails on different systems.
